title: Stock Futures Rise Ahead of Fresh Earnings
sub_head: Bond investors await clarity on the Fedâ€™s interest-rate plans
body:
U.S. stock futures edged higher to start the month as investors awaited fresh earnings.
Futures for the S&P 500 added 0.4% Monday, after the index last month recorded its largest percentage gain since November 2020. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average each rose 0.4%.
